original_title: Die gl√ºcklichen Minuten des Georg Hauser
overview: After a series of events, Georg Hauser, an established middle-class man, is at odds with the world, in which he himself used to work so well. He wants out. He wants to live. In a moment of his very own clarity, he destroys his car, but whoever destroys his property is an enemy of the state.
title: The Happy Minutes of Georg Hauser
